public class TileBlock
extends Tiles

The TileBlock class, to allow tiles that cannot be passed through in the GameWorld.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Matthew Hillier

Creates a new TileBlock.

Parameters:
inName - The door's name.
inSheetX - The image's X coordinate.
inSheetY - The image's Y coordinate.
inType - The Block's type.
tileSetNum - The tileSet id.
inWorldX - The X coordinate in the world.
inWorldY - The Y coordinate in the world.
